title: Is this possible ?
body:
Hi all,
Is it possible to remove the chat from the game interface and see only the smart pings ? 
It seems impossible for me to not backfire to guys that flame or are salty to me ,or my friends, and i don't want to get banned for it..
Thank you

replies.body: It's currently not possible to disable chat, but you can move it off your screen.  Keep in mind though, that if you hit enter and type players can still see what you say.  You can also use /mute all to not see player chat, as UnbenchedKench suggested.  We don't penalize players for selecting not to use chat, so feel free to stick to smart pings.  Hope that helps!
Use the /mute feature. Type "/Mute" In chat followed by the player's username.  If you want to mute everyone on both teams just do /mute all
